name: Phantasmal Lord Ultimitl Bishbaalkin
text:
1 non-Tuner monster - 1 Dark Tuner
You can Synchro Summon this card if the Level of the non-Tuner Synchro Material minus the Level of the Dark Tuner Synchro Material equals 0. Once per turn (Quick Effect): You can Special Summon as many "Utchatzimime Tokens" (Fiend-Type/DARK/Level 1/ATK 100/DEF 0) in Defense Position as possible to each player's side of the field, but they cannot be Tributed. Gains 1000 ATK for each monster on the field. If this card would be destroyed while your opponent controls a monster that can be destroyed, you can choose not to destroy it. If you do: Destroy all monsters your opponent controls, and if you do, inflict 200 damage to your opponent for each monster destroyed.
